body:
Functional change

- runtime service is started when managing a process
Adds ACME support via Let's Encrypt
Accept CORS for broker sidecar endpoint

Sidecar
- /broker now supports POST method to publish to the broker
- /registry now supports websockets to watch the registry

Previously missed
- cmd package is importable with a cmd.Init func so we can create prebaked versions of the toolkit
- examples github.com/micro/{grpc, nats, kubernetes}

- Fixes --enable_stats for the sidecar by preloading before router
- Fixes micro new template generation
Fixes the `micro new` template generation bugs
